chunks.zh: 在用友做项目专员和销售运营支持被裁员，找工作是真难
chunks.en: Laid off from Yonyou as a project specialist and sales operations support, finding a job is really difficult

chunks.zh:
在用友待了 5 年，2 年项目运营，3 年销售运营支持
年初用友开启大裁员计划，内部派系林立，站错队，即使拿了优秀员工绩效都 OK 感觉也没用
整个分行业没了，现在焦虑找工作 ing 心态真的难调节 整个人都抑郁了
招聘软件一堆不回复的
这里瞅瞅会有机会吗？

主要是一直在 tob 软件企业做项目运营和销售支持
这里都是开发来求职 不知道我这种助理小角色有公司捞一把吗 
base 上海
chunks.en:
I stayed at Yonyou for 5 years, 2 years in project operation, and 3 years in sales operation support.
At the beginning of the year, Yonyou started a major layoff plan. There are many internal factions. If you stand on the wrong team, even if you get excellent employee performance, it feels useless.
The entire sub-industry is gone, and now I'm anxiously looking for a job and it's really difficult to adjust my mentality. I'm feeling depressed.
A lot of recruitment software doesn't reply.
Is there a chance to find something here?

Mainly, I have been doing project operation and sales support in tob software companies.
There are all developers looking for jobs here. I wonder if any company will pick up a small role like me?
Based in Shanghai.

chunks.zh: 你要是回答 1 楼的问题，就落了下乘了！
chunks.en: If you answer the questions on the 1st floor, you will be at a disadvantage!

chunks.zh: 他又不招聘，你回答这些问题，他只会讥笑你。
chunks.en: He's not recruiting anyway, and if you answer these questions, he'll just sneer at you.

chunks.zh: 老老实实刷招聘软件吧
chunks.en: Just honestly browse the recruitment software.

chunks.zh: 感觉是行业的问题，国内 tob 就是很穷逼
chunks.en: I feel it's an industry issue. The domestic tob industry is very poor.

chunks.zh: @jasdkasdjkas 找工作是真难有几个问题了解下：1.你的学历是什么？2.你的年龄是什么？3.你要求的薪资是什么？
chunks.en: @jasdkasdjkas Finding a job is really difficult. I have a few questions to understand: 1. What is your educational background? 2. What is your age? 3. What is your desired salary?

chunks.zh: @cust2008  本科 35 岁 性别女 有娃 平时主要是跟交付 开发 销售打交道比较多薪资 10-12K 一个月 这个要求其实不算高
chunks.en: @cust2008 Bachelor's degree, 35 years old, female, has children. Usually deals with delivery, development, and sales. Salary is 10-12K a month. This requirement is actually not high.

chunks.zh: 用友的 erp 市场占有量还是蛮大的 找找制造类工厂之类的？
chunks.en: Yonyou's ERP market share is quite large. Try looking for manufacturing factories?

chunks.zh: 你的岗位定位属于售前技术支持吗。
chunks.en: Is your position pre-sales technical support?

chunks.zh: 有的公司会有自己专属的岗位名称，但是行业内还是有比较统一的岗位名称的。
chunks.en: Some companies have their own exclusive job titles, but there are relatively unified job titles in the industry.

chunks.zh: @heyjany 刷的焦虑了，各个平台都会看  给个工作就行 其他无所谓了
chunks.en: @heyjany I'm anxious from browsing. I'll look at all the platforms. Just give me a job, I don't care about anything else.

chunks.zh: 焦虑起来状态太差劲了有房贷 有娃要养 得向生活低头
chunks.en: I'm too anxious and in a terrible state. I have a mortgage and children to raise, so I have to bow my head to life.

chunks.zh: @heyjany 请不要以小人之心度君子之腹 谢谢！
chunks.en: @heyjany Please don't judge others with your own petty mind. Thank you!

chunks.zh: @jasdkasdjkas 1. 找工作一种朋友或同事推荐，2. 一个在公开市场刷简历和别人打招呼 守株待兔，你自己感觉简历 OK ，那是不是还有其他地方需要完善，只是你没有发现3. 还有一种是主动出击哈，直接找上门
chunks.en: @jasdkasdjkas 1. Job search is either a friend or colleague recommendation, 2. Or browsing resumes in the open market and greeting others, waiting for the rabbit. If you feel your resume is OK, is there anything else that needs to be improved that you haven't noticed? 3. There is also a way to take the initiative and go directly to the door.

chunks.zh: 换个其他的销售，比如卖特斯拉
chunks.en: Switch to another sales job, such as selling Teslas.

chunks.zh: 可以转行去个有未来的行业。
chunks.en: You can switch to an industry with a future.

chunks.zh: 如果盯着自己过往经历找个相关行业，过几年会面临现在一样的问题。
chunks.en: If you stare at your past experience and look for a related industry, you will face the same problems in a few years.

chunks.zh: 或者去个上下游的相关行业躺平。
chunks.en: Or go to a related upstream or downstream industry and lie flat.

chunks.zh: @leonlx 嗯 谢谢确实是这么个情况 也尝试搜一些相关的关键词 就是刷招聘软件抑郁了 这个里面来吐吐槽 碰碰运气 w
chunks.en: @leonlx Yes, thank you, that's really the situation. I also tried searching for some related keywords, but I got depressed from browsing the recruitment software and came here to vent and try my luck.

chunks.zh: 先投 ERP 相关的，其他 2b 的行业也都试试，别听那些冷嘲热讽的，先海投海面有个饭碗再说。
chunks.en: First apply for ERP-related jobs, and also try other 2b industries. Don't listen to those sarcastic remarks, first cast a wide net to get a job.

chunks.zh: 请教个问题，销售运营用哪些交流论坛
chunks.en: May I ask a question, what communication forums are used for sales operations?

chunks.zh: @jasdkasdjkas 市场就是这样的，我们公司营销岗已经不招女的了，又不能喝又要照顾孩子，万一再安排二胎三胎，白养半年。
chunks.en: @jasdkasdjkas The market is like this. Our company no longer hires women for marketing positions. They can't drink and have to take care of their children. If they arrange for a second or third child, they will be supported for half a year for nothing.

chunks.zh: @heyjany 还好没要求报三围体重😁
chunks.en: @heyjany Fortunately, they didn't ask for measurements and weight 😁

chunks.zh: @wnpllrzodiac 苦笑 没工作你说啥都行
chunks.en: @wnpllrzodiac Bitter smile, you can say anything when you don't have a job.

chunks.zh: PMO 吗？
chunks.en: PMO?

chunks.zh: 她这个只能说是 PMO 成员，楼主在哪个城市？
chunks.en: She can only be said to be a PMO member. Which city are you in?

chunks.zh: 如果说不急那是假的，但回过头来看真别太焦虑，大环境如此要学着调心态，工作不成身体出了问题得不偿失不是、
chunks.en: It's fake to say that I'm not in a hurry, but looking back, don't be too anxious. The general environment is like this, so you have to learn to adjust your mentality. It's not worth it if you can't find a job and your body has problems.

chunks.zh: @mwftts 上海
chunks.en: @mwftts Shanghai
